definition: to inspire awe
power/might/prestige
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
to inspire awe throughout the empire (idiom)

sentences.english: Oslash; Starscream, Overlord, Scorponok and Onslaught agree to follow Megatron.
sentences.chinese: 红蜘蛛，霸主，萨克巨人与袭击同谋共保威震天。

sentences.english: So you mean, Megatron is near success?
sentences.chinese: 你是说，威震天就要成功了？

sentences.english: Megatron will watch, and wait his time to strike.
sentences.chinese: 威震天把这个看在眼里，并等待时机攻击。

sentences.english: Oslash; Prime and Megatron lost on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 擎天柱与威震天一同坠落地球。

sentences.english: Megatron must be stoped, no matter the cost.
sentences.chinese: 必须不惜一切代价阻止威震天。

sentences.english: Jazz: You want a piece of me Megatron ?
sentences.chinese: 你想要拆我一块下来吗，威震天？

sentences.english: GALVATRON is a powered up version of MEGATRON making him the epitome of egotistical might and tyranny.
sentences.chinese: 能量强化后的威震天，是骄狂和残暴的化身。

sentences.english: Megarton and his forces remain at large.
sentences.chinese: 威震天和他的部队仍然逍遥法外。

sentences.english: Megatron plans the conquest of Earth.
Slowly I turn to face Megatron.
sentences.chinese: 我慢慢地扭头望向威震天。

sentences.english: Still, Megatron is nothing. if not patient.
sentences.chinese: 威震天算不了什么的，如果他没有耐性。

sentences.english: Overawes eight side ploies to introduce Chris.
sentences.chinese: 威震八方剧情介绍克里斯。

sentences.english: Starscream, Overlord, Scorponok and Onslaught agree to follow Megatron.
sentences.chinese: 红蜘蛛，领主，萨克巨人与袭击同谋共保威震天。

sentences.english: Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.
sentences.chinese: 钢锁与撞针于大角斗场结识威震天。

sentences.english: If MEGATRON tells him to do something, he does it without hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 不管威震天下达什么命令，他都会毫不犹豫地执行。

sentences.english: Oslash; Grimlock and Impactor meet Megatron within the arenas.
sentences.chinese: 钢锁与撞针于大角斗场结识威震天。

definition: to inspire awe throughout the empire (idiom)
fame for fighting prowess/military glory
brilliant/impressive/outstanding
to be invincible/unrivalled
to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
prestige/renown/influence
to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4 , zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4

definition: to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc)/to hold as one's personal fiefdom
to unify/unified
to sweep everything before one/to be invincible (idiom)
to be brave and good at fighting (idiom)
hero/towering figure
to lead military operations with extraordinary skill
fierce general/valiant military leader/fig. brave individual
to become famous/to become notorious
to flee at the mere sight of (idiom)
